Package GameEngine

Interface GameEventListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
MainWindow
public interface GameEventListener
Interface for listening to game events.

    Method

  • Method Details

    • onDiceRolled

      void onDiceRolled(String playerName, int die1, int die2)
      Called when dice are rolled.
      Parameters:
      playerName - the name of the player who rolled the dice
      die1 - the value of the first die
      die2 - the value of the second die

    • onPlayerMoved

      void onPlayerMoved(Player player)
      Called when a player moves.
      Parameters:
      player - the player who moved

    • onGameOver

      void onGameOver(Player winner)
      Called when the game is over.
      Parameters:
      winner - the player who won the game

    • onQuestionEncountered

      void onQuestionEncountered(Question question)
      Called when a question is encountered.
      Parameters:
      question - the question encountered

    • onGameStatus

      void onGameStatus(String message)
      Called when the game status changes.
      Parameters:
      message - the status message
